justification: Acknowledges Team B’s appetite for rookie ceiling by offering Trevor Rodriguez, but overlooks B’s TE depth and A’s injury-averse stance in seeking a questionable Tier-4 TE. The deal is incoherent for Team A: surrendering a Tier-1 WR for a marginal TE upgrade (arguably a downgrade vs Holt) doesn’t fit A’s needs. Rationale is generic and lacks role/tier/schedule context.
